GR13gorst2pu:5: jñānāmoda-mahodadhiḥ samabhavad yatrādināthaḥ svayaṃ vyaktāvyakta-guṇādhikaṃ tam aniśaṃ śrī-mīnanāthaṃ bhaje // GorS(2)_2 //
GR13gorst2pu:6: namaskṛtya guruṃ bhaktyā gorakṣo jñānam uttamam /
GR13gorst2pu:9: dhruvaṃ yasyāvabodhena jāyate paramaṃ padam // GorS(2)_4 //
GR13gorst2pu:11: yad vyāvṛttaṃ mano mohād āsaktaṃ paramātmani // GorS(2)_5 (=1/2) //
GR13gorst2pu:13: śamanaṃ bhava-tāpasya yogaṃ bhajati sajjanaḥ // GorS(2)_6 (=1/3) //
GR13gorst2pu:15: dhyānaṃ samādhir etāni yogāṅgāni bhavanti ṣaṭ // GorS(2)_7 (=1/4) //
GR13gorst2pu:17: eteṣām akhilān bhedān vijānāti maheśvaraḥ // GorS(2)_8 (=1/5) //
GR13gorst2pu:19: tataḥ śivena pīṭhānāṃ ṣoḍeśānaṃ śataṃ kṛtam // GorS(2)_9 (=1/6) //
GR13gorst2pu:21: ekaṃ siddhāsanaṃ proktaṃ dvitīyaṃ kamalāsanam // GorS(2)_10 (=1/7) //
GR13gorst2pu:22: yoni-sthānakam aṅghri-mūla-ghaṭitaṃ kṛtvā dṛḍhaṃ vinyasen meḍhre pādam athaikam eva niyataṃ kṛtvā samaṃ vigraham /
GR13gorst2pu:23: sthāṇuḥ saṃyamitendriyo'cala-dṛśā paśyan bhruvor antaram etan mokṣa-kavāṭa-bheda-janakaṃ siddhāsanaṃ procyate // GorS(2)_11 (=1/8) //
GR13gorst2pu:24: vāmorūpari dakṣiṇaṃ hi caraṇaṃ saṃsthāpya vāmaṃ tathā dakṣorūpari paścimena vidhinā dhṛtvā karābhyāṃ dṛḍham /
GR13gorst2pu:25: aṅguṣṭhau hṛdaye nidhāya cibukaṃ nāsāgram ālokayed etad-vyādhi-vikāra-hāri yamināṃ padmāsanaṃ procyate // GorS(2)_12 (=1/9) //
GR13gorst2pu:27: sva-dehe ye na jānanti kathaṃ sidhyanti yoginaḥ // GorS(2)_13 //
GR13gorst2pu:29: sva-dehaṃ ye na jānanti kathaṃ sidhyanti yoginaḥ // GorS(2)_14 //
GR13gorst2pu:30: caturdalaṃ syād ādhāraḥ svādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca ṣaṭ-dalam /
GR13gorst2pu:31: nābhau daśa-dalaṃ padmaṃ sūrya-saṅkhya-dalaṃ hṛdi // GorS(2)_15 //
GR13gorst2pu:32: kaṇṭhe syāt ṣoḍaśa-dalaṃ bhrū-madhye dvidalaṃ tathā /
GR13gorst2pu:35: yoni-sthānaṃ dvayor madhye kāma-rūpaṃ nigadyate // GorS(2)_17 (=1/10) //
GR13gorst2pu:37: tan-madhye procyate yoniḥ kāmākṣā siddha-vanditā // GorS(2)_18 (=1/11) //
GR13gorst2pu:39: mastake maṇivad bimbaṃ yo jānāti sa yogavit // GorS(2)_19 (=1/12) //
GR13gorst2pu:41: trikoṇaṃ tat-puraṃ vahner adho-meḍhrāt pratiṣṭhitam // GorS(2)_20 (=1/13) //
GR13gorst2pu:42: yat samādhau paraṃ jyotir anantaṃ viśvato-mukham /
GR13gorst2pu:43: tasmin dṛṣṭe mahā-yoge yātāyātaṃ na vidyate // GorS(2)_21 //
GR13gorst2pu:45: svādhiṣṭhānāt padād asmān meḍhram evābhidhīyate // GorS(2)_22 (=1/14) //
GR13gorst2pu:46: tantunā maṇivat proto yatra kandaḥ suṣumṇayā /
GR13gorst2pu:49: tāvaj jīvo bhramaty eva yāvat tattvaṃ na vindati // GorS(2)_24 //
GR13gorst2pu:50: ūrdhvaṃ meḍhrād adho nābheḥ kanda-yoniḥ khagāṇḍavat /
GR13gorst2pu:51: tatra nāḍyaḥ samutpannāḥ sahasrāṇāṃ dvisaptatiḥ // GorS(2)_25 (=1/16) //
GR13gorst2pu:53: pradhānaṃ prāṇa-vāhinyo bhūyas tatra daśa smṛtāḥ // GorS(2)_26 (=1/17) //
GR13gorst2pu:54: iḍā ca piṅgalā caiva suṣumṇā ca tṛtīyakā /
GR13gorst2pu:55: gāndhārī hasti-jihvā ca pūṣā caiva yaśasvinī // GorS(2)_27 (=1/18) //
GR13gorst2pu:56: alambuṣā kuhūś caiva śaṅkhinī daśamī smṛtā /
GR13gorst2pu:57: etan nāḍi-mayaṃ cakraṃ jñātavyaṃ yogibhiḥ sadā // GorS(2)_28 (=1/19) //
GR13gorst2pu:58: iḍā vāme sthitā bhāge piṅgalā dakṣiṇe tathā /
GR13gorst2pu:59: suṣumṇā madhya-deśe tu gāndhārī vāma-cakṣuṣi // GorS(2)_29 (=1/20) //
GR13gorst2pu:60: dakṣiṇe hasti-jihvā ca pūṣā karṇe ca dakṣiṇe /
GR13gorst2pu:61: yaśasvinī vāma-karṇe cāsane vāpy alambuṣā // GorS(2)_30 (=1/21) //
GR13gorst2pu:62: kuhūś ca liṅga-deśe tu mūla-sthāne ca śaṅkhinī /
GR13gorst2pu:63: evaṃ dvāram upāśritya tiṣṭhanti daśa-nāḍikāḥ // GorS(2)_31 (=1/22) //
GR13gorst2pu:66: prāṇo'pānaḥ samānaś ca udāno vyānau ca vāyavaḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:67: nāgaḥ kūrmo'tha kṛkaro devadatto dhanañjayaḥ // GorS(2)_33 (=1/24) //
GR13gorst2pu:68: hṛdi prāṇo vasen nityaṃ apāno guda-maṇḍale /
GR13gorst2pu:69: samāno nābhi-deśe syād udānaḥ kaṇṭha-madhyagaḥ // GorS(2)_34 //
GR13gorst2pu:71: kṛkaraḥ kṣuta-kṛj jñeyo devadatto vijṛmbhaṇe // GorS(2)_35 //
GR13gorst2pu:72: na jahāti mṛtaṃ cāpi sarva-vyāpi dhanañjayaḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:73: ete sarvāsu nāḍīṣu bhramante jīva-rūpiṇaḥ // GorS(2)_36 (=1/25) //
GR13gorst2pu:75: prāṇāpāna-samākṣiptas tathā jīvo na tiṣṭhati // GorS(2)_38 (=1/27) //
GR13gorst2pu:76: prāṇāpāna-vaśo jīvo hy adhaś cordhvaṃ ca dhāvati /
GR13gorst2pu:79: guṇa-baddhas tathā jīvaḥ prāṇāpānena kṛṣyate // GorS(2)_40 (=1/28) //
GR13gorst2pu:80: apānaḥ karṣati prāṇaḥ prāṇo'pānaṃ ca karṣati /
GR13gorst2pu:81: ūrdhvādhaḥ saṃsthitāv etau saṃyojayati yogavit // GorS(2)_41 (=1/29) //
GR13gorst2pu:82: ha-kāreṇa bahir yāti sa-kāreṇa viśet punaḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:83: haṃsa-haṃsety amuṃ mantraṃ jīvo japati sarvadā // GorS(2)_42 //
GR13gorst2pu:85: etat saṅkhyānvitaṃ mantra jīvo japati sarvadā // GorS(2)_43 //
GR13gorst2pu:88: anayā sadṛśī vidyā anayā sadṛśo japaḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:89: anayā sadṛśaṃ jñānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati // GorS(2)_45 //
GR13gorst2pu:91: prāṇa-vidyā mahā-vidyā yas tāṃ vetti sa yogavit // GorS(2)_46 //
GR13gorst2pu:97: sūcīvad guṇam ādāya vrajaty ūrdhvaṃ suṣumṇayā // GorS(2)_49 (=1/31) //
GR13gorst2pu:99: prabuddhā vahni-yogena vratya ūrdhvaṃ suṣumṇayā // GorS(2)_50 //
GR13gorst2pu:100: udghaṭayet kapātaṃ tu yathā kuñcikayā haṭhāt /
GR13gorst2pu:101: kuṇḍalinyā tathā yogī mokṣa-dvāraṃ prabhedayet // GorS(2)_51 //
GR13gorst2pu:102: kṛtvā sampuṭitau karau dṛḍhataraṃ baddhvā tu padmāsanaṃ gāḍhaṃ vakṣasi sannidhāya cibukaṃ dhyātvā ca tat prekṣitam /
GR13gorst2pu:103: vāraṃ vāram apānam ūrdhvam anilaṃ proccārayet pūritaṃ muñcan prāṇam upaiti bodham atulaṃ śakti-prabodhān naraḥ // GorS(2)_52 (=HYP 1.50) //
GR13gorst2pu:107: abdād ūrdhvaṃ bhavet siddho nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GorS(2)_54 (=HYP 1.59) //
GR13gorst2pu:109: bhujyate sura-samprītyai mitāhāraḥ sa ucyate // GorS(2)_55 (=HYP 1.60) //
GR13gorst2pu:111: bandhanāya ca mūḍhānāṃ yogināṃ mokṣadā smṛtā // GorS(2)_56 (=HYP 3.107) //
GR13gorst2pu:113: mūla-bandhaṃ ca yo vetti sa yogī siddhi-bhājanam // GorS(2)_57 (=1/32) //
GR13gorst2pu:116: vakṣo-nyasta-hanur nipīḍya suciraṃ yoniṃ ca vāmāṅghriṇā hastābhyām avadhāritaṃ prasaritaṃ pādaṃ tathā dakṣiṇam /
GR13gorst2pu:117: āpūrya śvasanena kukṣi-yugalaṃ baddhvā śanai recayed eṣā pātaka-nāśinī sumahatī mudrā nṝṇāṃ procyate // GorS(2)_59 (=1/33) //
GR13gorst2pu:119: yāvat tulyā bhavet saṅkhyā tato mudrāṃ visarjayet // GorS(2)_60 (=HYP 3.15) //
GR13gorst2pu:120: na hi pathyam apathyaṃ vā rasāḥ sarve'pi nīrasāḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:121: api muktaṃ viṣaṃ ghoraṃ pīyūṣam api jīryate // GorS(2)_61 (=HYP 3.16) //
GR13gorst2pu:123: tasya doṣāḥ kṣayaṃ yānti mahāmudrāṃ tu yo'bhyaset // GorS(2)_62 (=HYP 3.17) //
GR13gorst2pu:125: gopanīyā prayatnena na deyā yasya kasyacit // GorS(2)_63 (=HYP 3.18) //
GR13gorst2pu:127: bhruvor antargatā dṛṣṭir mudrā bhavati khecarī // GorS(2)_64 (=1/34) //
GR13gorst2pu:128: na rogo maraṇaṃ tandrā na nidrā na kṣudhā tṛṣā /
GR13gorst2pu:129: na ca mūrcchā bhavet tasya yo mudrāṃ vetti khecarīm // GorS(2)_65 (=HYP 3.39) //
GR13gorst2pu:130: pīḍyate na sa rogeṇa lipyate na ca karmaṇā /
GR13gorst2pu:131: bādhyate na sa kālena yo mudrāṃ vetti khecarīm // GorS(2)_66 (=HYP 3.40) //
GR13gorst2pu:132: cittaṃ carati khe yasmāj jihvā carati khe gatā /
GR13gorst2pu:133: tenaiṣā khecarī nāma mudrā siddhair nirūpitā // GorS(2)_67 (=HYP 3.41) //
GR13gorst2pu:134: bindu-mūlaṃ śarīraṃ tu śirās tatra pratiṣṭhitāḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:137: na tasya kṣarate binduḥ kāminyāliṅgitasya ca // GorS(2)_69 //
GR13gorst2pu:138: yāvad binduḥ sthito dehe tāvat kāla-bhayaṃ kutaḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:139: yāvad baddhā nabho-mudrā tāvad bindur na gacchati // GorS(2)_70 //
GR13gorst2pu:140: calito'pi yadā binduḥ samprāptaś ca hutāśanam /
GR13gorst2pu:141: vrajaty ūrdhvaṃ hṛtaḥ śaktyā niruddho yoni-mudrayā // GorS(2)_71 (=HYP 3.43) //
GR13gorst2pu:142: sa punar dvividho binduḥ paṇḍuro lohitas tathā /
GR13gorst2pu:143: pāṇḍuraṃ śukram ity āhur lohitaṃ tu mahārājaḥ // GorS(2)_72 //
GR13gorst2pu:145: śaśi-sthāne sthito bindus tayor aikyaṃ sudurlabham // GorS(2)_73 //
GR13gorst2pu:146: binduḥ śivo rajaḥ śaktir bindum indū rajo raviḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:147: ubhayoḥ saṅgamād eva prāpyate paramaṃ padam // GorS(2)_74 //
GR13gorst2pu:149: bindunaiti sahaikatvaṃ bhaved divyaṃ vapus tadā // GorS(2)_75 //
GR13gorst2pu:150: śukraṃ candreṇa saṃyuktaṃ rajaḥ sūryeṇa saṃyutam /
GR13gorst2pu:151: tayoḥ samarasaikatvaṃ yojānāti sa yogavit // GorS(2)_76 //
GR13gorst2pu:153: uḍḍīyānaṃ tad eva syāt tava bandho'bhidhīyate // GorS(2)_77 (=HYP 3.56) //
GR13gorst2pu:154: udarāt paścime bhāge hy adho nābher nigadyate /
GR13gorst2pu:155: uḍḍīyanasya bandho'yaṃ tatra bandho vidhīyate // GorS(2)_78 //
GR13gorst2pu:159: pīyūṣaṃ na pataty agnau na ca vāyuḥ prakupyati // GorS(2)_80 (=1/36, HYP 3.72) //
GR13gorst2pu:161: apānam ūrdhvam ākṛṣya mūla-bandho'bhidhīyate // GorS(2)_81 (=1/37, HYP 3.61) //
GR13gorst2pu:163: yuvā bhavati vṛddho'pi satataṃ mūla-bandhanāt // GorS(2)_82 (=1/38, HYP 3.65) //
GR13gorst2pu:165: nāsāgra-dṛṣṭir ekānte japed oṅkāram avyayam // GorS(2)_83 //
GR13gorst2pu:166: bhūr bhuvaḥ svar ime lokāḥ soma-sūryāgni-devatāḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:167: yasyā mātrāsu tiṣṭhanti tat paraṃ jyotir om iti // GorS(2)_84 //
GR13gorst2pu:168: trayaḥ kālās trayo vedās trayo lokās trayaḥ sverāḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:169: trayo devāḥ sthitā yatra tat paraṃ jyotir om iti // GorS(2)_85 //
GR13gorst2pu:170: kriyā cecchā tathā jñānā brāhmī raudrī ca vaiṣṇavī /
GR13gorst2pu:171: tridhā śaktiḥ sthitā yatra tat paraṃ jyotir om iti // GorS(2)_86 //
GR13gorst2pu:173: tisro mātrāḥ sthitā yatra tat paraṃ jyotir om iti // GorS(2)_87 //
GR13gorst2pu:174: vacasā taj jayed bījaṃ vapuṣā tat samabhyaset /
GR13gorst2pu:175: manasā tat smaren nityaṃ tat paraṃ jyotir om iti // GorS(2)_88 //
GR13gorst2pu:176: śucir vāpy aśucir vāpi yo japet praṇavaṃ sadā /
GR13gorst2pu:177: lipyate na sa pāpena padma-patram ivāmbhasā // GorS(2)_89 //
GR13gorst2pu:178: cale vāte calo bindur niścale niścalo bhavet /
GR13gorst2pu:179: yogī sthāṇutvam āpnoti tato vāyuṃ nirodhayet // GorS(2)_90 (=1/39, HYP 2.2) //
GR13gorst2pu:180: yāvad vāyuḥ sthito dehe tāvaj jīvanam ucyate /
GR13gorst2pu:181: maraṇaṃ tasya niṣkrāntis tato vāyuṃ nirodhayet // GorS(2)_91 (=HYP 2.3) //
GR13gorst2pu:182: yāvad baddho marud dehe yāvac cittaṃ nirākulam /
GR13gorst2pu:183: yāvad dṛṣṭir bhruvor madhye tāvat kāla-bhayaṃ kutaḥ // GorS(2)_92 (=HYP 2.40) //
GR13gorst2pu:185: yogino munayaś caiva tato vāyuṃ nirodhayet // GorS(2)_93 //
GR13gorst2pu:188: śuddhim eti yadā sarvaṃ nāḍī-cakraṃ malākulam /
GR13gorst2pu:189: tadaiva jāyate yogī prāṇa-saṃgrahaṇe kṣamaḥ // GorS(2)_95 //
GR13gorst2pu:191: dhārayitvā yathā-śakti bhūyaḥ sūryeṇa recayet // GorS(2)_96 (=1/43) //
GR13gorst2pu:193: dhyātvā candramaso bimbaṃ prāṇāyāmī sukhī bhavet // GorS(2)_97 (=1/44) //
GR13gorst2pu:194: dakṣiṇo śvāsam ākṛṣya pūrayed udaraṃ śanaiḥ /
GR13gorst2pu:195: kumbhayitvā vidhānena puraś candreṇa recayet // GorS(2)_98 (=1/45) //
GR13gorst2pu:197: dhyātvā nābhi-sthitaṃ yogī prāṇāyāme sukhī bhavet // GorS(2)_99 (=1/46) //
GR13gorst2pu:198: prāṇaṃ codiḍayā piben parimitaṃ bhūyo'nyayā recayet pītvā piṅgalayā samīraṇam atho baddhvā tyajed vāmayā /
GR13gorst2pu:199: sūrya-candramasor anena vidhinā bimba-dvayaṃ dhyāyataḥ śuddhā nāḍi-gaṇā bhavanti yamino māsa-trayād ūrdhvataḥ // GorS(2)_100 (=HYP 2.10) //
